entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
